# Operating System files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Editor-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Dependency directories (if using package managers like npm for CSS preprocessors)
node_modules/
bower_components/

# Build artifacts or generated files (e.g., minified CSS/JS if not tracked)
dist/
build/
*.min.css
*.min.js

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak

# Configuration files specific to your local environment
.env
.env.local
